plot: From lowly grocery store clerk to drug addict -- Niles Triggs finds himself on the brink of a lost paradise and a death-marked path to salvation.
title: So Far, So Good
plot_es: From lowly grocery store clerk to drug addict -- Niles Triggs finds himself on the brink of a lost paradise and a death-marked path to salvation.
plot_en: From lowly grocery store clerk to drug addict -- Niles Triggs finds himself on the brink of a lost paradise and a death-marked path to salvation.
